title: MD
biography: Andrzej Szczeklik was a Polish immunologist working at the Jagiellonian University School of Medicine in Kraków. Having received numerous distinctions for his research, Szczeklik was also well known as a writer.
aiSummary: Andrzej Szczeklik is a internal medicine specialist with an H-index of 88 at Jagiellonian University (Member). Has been published in BMJ, The Lancet. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
